TextEng: I think we need to change your tactics.
Text: 네 전술을 좀 바꿔야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: I think I'll do better off on my own.
Text: 혼자 하는 게 나을 것 같아.

TextEng: We need to change the distance you stay away from me.
Six feet.
Twelve feet.
Eighteen feet.
Nevermind.
Could you alter your spell casting practices?
Text: 주문 시전 방식을 바꿔줄 수 있어?

TextEng: I want you to use your most powerful spells first.
Try to overpower monster with higher level spells.
Try to user appropriately powered spells for the monsters we fight.
Text: 싸우는 괴물에 맞게 적절한 주문을 써봐.

TextEng: Could we change how quickly you decide to heal me.
Text: 나를 치료하는 타이밍을 바꿔줄 수 있어?

TextEng: Heal me if I become somewhat injured (below 75% of total hit points).
Heal me if I become wounded (below 50% of total hit points).
Heal me if I become seriously wounded (below 25% of total hit points).
Could you not search all the time?
Could you please search when we move around?
Could you use more stealth when we travel?
Text: 이동할 때 좀 더 은밀하게 다녀줄래?

TextEng: Could you stop being so stealthy all the time?
Text: 항상 그렇게 은밀하게 안 해도 돼.

TextEng: If I fail to open a locked door or chest, please come to my aid.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘.

TextEng: If I fail to open a locked door or chest, do not assist me.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자 여는 데 실패해도 도와주지 마.

TextEng: I don't want to change anything else right now.
We need change way you do stuff.
Me no want you here no more.
Text: 나 더 이상 너 필요 없어.

TextEng: You change how far away you stay.
Text: 너 거리 바꿔. 얼마나 멀리 있을지.

TextEng: You need change how you shoot spells.
Text: 너 주문 쏘는 거 바꿔야 해.

TextEng: You need change how you heal me.
Text: 너 나 치료하는 거 바꿔야 해.

TextEng: You not search all time no more.
You search all time when we move.
Text: 너 우리 움직일 때 맨날 찾아다녀.

TextEng: You stop sneaking so quiet now.
You start sneak quiet now.
If me fail on locked door or chest, you help me.
Text: 나 잠긴 거 못 열면 너 도와줘.

TextEng: If me fail on locked door or chest, you not help me.
Text: 나 잠긴 거 못 열어도 너 도와주지 마.

TextEng: Me not want change anything else now.
Text: 나 지금 다른 거 안 바꿔.

TextEng: Use you most powerful spells first.
Text: 너 제일 쎈 주문 먼저 써.

TextEng: You try overpower monster with higher level spells.
You try use strong spells on strong baddies and weak spells on weak baddies.
Text: 쎈 놈한테 쎈 주문 쓰고 약한 놈한테 약한 주문 써.

TextEng: You heal if me sort of hurt (below 75% of total hit points).
You heal if me wounded (below 50% of total hit points).
You heal if me hurt real bad (below 25% of total hit points).
Yes. Go.
No. Stay.
Okay, join up with me.
Okay, you be join up with me.
Sorry, not interested.
Join up?
Forget it.
Goodbye.
Some got what it takes. Some don't got it.
Text: 어떤 놈은 되고. 어떤 놈은 안 되고.

TextEng: Some people have what it takes, some don't.
Text: 될 사람은 되고, 안 될 사람은 안 되는 거야.

TextEng: You just got to stick with it.
You just have to stick with it, Pavel.
